Messages.CustomerCreationFailure: Sorry, we were unable to create the customer with the details provided at the moment, kindly try again later.
Messages.CustomerSearchFailure: Customer Search failed, kindly try again later.
Messages.CustomerNotFound: Could not retrieve Customer Information with the specified Id.
Messages.CustomerModificationDuplicate: There is a pending modification request on going for the specified customer.
Messages.ModificationNotFound: Modification request for the specified customer cannot be found.
Messages.InvalidModificationRequest: There is no pending modification request for the specified customer.
Messages.ProcessDeclined: Process was declined on Process Maker
Messages.ProcessFailed: Process status could not be verified
